name: JC Newman 110th Anniversary Perfecto
additionalNotes:
These short perfecto cigars are encased in a unqie glass tube with "J.C. Newman Cigar Company 1895-2005" written on the brass band in the middle of the casing.

The shape recreates a vitola that the founder, JC Newman, rolled back in the late 1890's. 10 of each of the following cigars (from left to right) comes in the JC Newman 110th Anniversary Humidor:

1. Diamond Crown 1895 Perfecto (5" x 54) 
2. DC Maximus 1895 Perfecto (5" x 54) 
3. La Unica Perfecto 1895 Perfecto (5" x 54) 
4. Cuesta Rey Perfecto 1895 Perfecto (5" x 54)
